title: FS (final price reduction) - T213-3 Hal Chase Blue Portrait PSA 2

posts.post_title: FS (final price reduction) - T213-3 Hal Chase Blue Portrait PSA 2
posts.post_content: For Sale (final price reduction) - A difficult to find T213-3 Hal Chase Blue Portrait graded PSA 2.  $825 venmo no fee or $855 pp gs.  Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  NC residents add 6.5% sales tax to any agreed upon price.
